intro: Kuepferia doxiongshangensis, commonly known as the Doxiongshangensis kuepferia, is a rare flowering plant native to China. It belongs to the family Campanulaceae and is characterized by its bell-shaped flowers. The plant typically grows in rocky or mountainous regions, adapting to harsh environmental conditions. Its leaves are usually narrow and hairy, providing a degree of protection against strong winds. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a species of conservation concern.
